title: Jax
description: The truth requires digging deepJessica Burrell only wanted to help people, but when a group of hostiles take her captive, she can’t even help herself. Then the SEALs arrive at the compound right when she’s ready to give up. Gaining freedom isn’t the end of her struggles, and she needs help. Thankfully, Anthony “Jax” Dean is there for her.Jax isn’t ready for a relationship, but there’s something about Jessica that makes him take notice. She’s the one for him but convincing her his harder than he anticipated. When his ex noses in and les to Jessica, she runs. Now he needs to catch Jessica before something awful happens.
author: Julia Bright
